definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Chavigny, of course, the King, and also my apothecary and myself.
sentences.chinese: 夏维尼，国王，药剂师和我自己。

sentences.english: eventually, they settled in Nucla and opened the Apothecary Shoppe.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他们在纽克拉定居并开了“药剂师专柜”。

sentences.english: The ugly druggist struggled to get his luggage .
sentences.chinese: 丑陋的药剂师挣扎着去拿行李。

sentences.english: The last man was a government worker.
These are available from a pharmacist.
sentences.chinese: 这些可从一药剂师得到。

sentences.english: Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are taking sedatives or tranquilizers.
sentences.chinese: 如果你正在服用镇静剂，使用前询问医生或药剂师。

sentences.english: The pharmacist says that sanitary products for menstruating women are simply not available.
sentences.chinese: 药剂师说，他们没有供应妇女月经来潮时的清洁用品。

sentences.english: The next morning Morgiana went to the druggist.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上她去找药剂师。

sentences.english: Pharmacists in the United Sates must meet the professional requirements of the sate where they want to work.
sentences.chinese: 美国的药剂师必须达到他们所在州的职业要求。

sentences.english: The pharmacist fills hundreds of prescriptions per day.
sentences.chinese: 药剂师每天要照方配几百付药。

sentences.english: The chemist sucked up 20 cc. of acetic acid into a pipette .
sentences.chinese: 药剂师把20立方厘米醋酸吸入吸量管中。

sentences.english: The apothecary cooked the medicinal mixture in a big iron kettle.
sentences.chinese: 药剂师在一个大铁壶里熬这种合药混物。

sentences.english: Some people drive eighty miles just to visit the Apothecary Shoppe.
sentences.chinese: 有些人为了来一趟“药剂师专柜”要开八十英里的车。

sentences.english: A fatwa is a medicine which has to be given by a qualified physician.
sentences.chinese: 判例就像医药，只有具备资格的药剂师才能开出。

definition: legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
Yaksu in North Korea, near the border with Liaoning and Jiling province
